reviewText: 97.00 ????? SHAME ON YOU!! ALL PEOPLE HAVE TO DO IS DOWNLOAD THE FREE YOUTUBE DOWLOAD SOFTWARE FOUND THROUGH GOOGLE AND GO TO YOUTUBE AND DOWNLOAD THIS AND ANY OTHER MOVIE THEY HAVE. I WOULD SUGGEST BUYING A ONE TERABYTE OUTBOARD HARD DRIVE AND THEN DOWNLOAD AWAY!! 97.00...... GIVE HUMANITY A BREAK!!

This movie is a must for all ninja movie fans ,one of the best more modern ninja
  movies .Great visuals,this is a very well done movie based in historical truth
but spiced up for film . This is not the cheesey type ninja movie that most people
think of that came out in the 80's era. Do yourself a favor and pick up a copy if
Amazon ever carries this title again ,otherwise it is worth the hunt.
